channel.title: [PI] Owner/mod shop
channel.description: Ok so i made a owner/mod shop with 1 npc that opens the shop up accordingly to the player rights... all i need now is to make all the item that are inside those shops free, would any one know how to do this? if so please leave a comment :) or pm me.

item.title: [PI] Owner/mod shop
item.dc:creator: @Darkmist Darkmist
item.description:
@Darkmist wrote:

Yeah i took a chance and just started coding and everything is working fine atm, Iv added the system to shopassistnat.java, Added the token things to playersave.java and the int to player.java… Now to test to see if an item will work

thanks for trying to help

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Owner/mod shop
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

I’ve never worked with PI loolz, but I’d guess so, you would probably have to add it to your player.java to as well so the points save to the characters, etc. I’m not sure though. =.^.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Owner/mod shop
item.dc:creator: @Darkmist Darkmist
item.description:
@Darkmist wrote:

[quote=“Nasz, post:2, topic:400425”]Option 1:

Honestly, you’d have to set the prices too 0gp.

Option 2:

Create a special points system and make the shops use the point system too buy stuff from it. (like a pk shop, donator shop, etc.) :rolleyes:[/quote]

I was thinking about option 2 but i look through the pkp point system code and i dont really understand it because its got another bit were u list the items? Im assuming id just copy the pkp code and change it into my own like ownerpoints or w/e? and then adding onto the list with items? :S im not sure im pretty noob with java but iv tryed to do most things

Read full topic
